word:
I urge upon all to whom these words shall come, Review your own course of action, and "take heed to yourselves, lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting, and drunkenness, and cares of this life, and so that day come upon you unawares. For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth" [Luke 21:34, 35].--Manuscript 16, 1896. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. May 12, 1988. Entire Ms.
